001package org.relationlearn.util.io;
002
003import java.util.Map;
004import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
005
006/**
007 * The OutputGenerator interface defines the rules any implementationg should
008 * follow in order to provide output format for representing the data in a 
009 * Map of RelationDigraph objects.
010 * 
011 * @see org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph
012 */
013public interface OutputGenerator {
014    
015    /**
016     * Using the data provided in {@code graphTable} this method generates an
017     * output in the {@code outputUri} parameter.
018     * 
019     * <p>
020     * <b>Note: </b> The specific nature of the output generated is 
021     * implementation dependent and should be documented accordingly in 
022     * its corresponding javadoc page.
023     * </p>
024     * 
025     * @param graphTable the Map containing the RelationDigraph objects
026     * @param outputUri the URI in which the outpur will be generated
027     */
028    public void generateOutput(Map<String, RelationDigraph> graphTable,
029            String outputUri);
030
031}
